problem_names: lemma Let'_unfold [vcg_simp]: "Let' x f = f x"

lemma Let'_split_conv [vcg_simp]:
  "(Let' x  (\<lambda>p. (case_prod (f p) (g p)))) =
   (Let' x  (\<lambda>p. (f p) (fst (g p)) (snd (g p))))"
translations: lemma Let'_unfold [vcg_simp]: "Let' x f = f x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Let' x f = f x

lemma Let'_split_conv [vcg_simp]:
  "(Let' x  (\<lambda>p. (case_prod (f p) (g p)))) =
   (Let' x  (\<lambda>p. (f p) (fst (g p)) (snd (g p))))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (LET p = x IN case g p of (x, xa) \<Rightarrow> f p x xa) =
    (LET p = x IN f p (fst (g p)) (snd (g p)))
